enWisdom: The evil deed is erased by a benevolent act

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَالْإِسَاءَةَ فَإِنَّهَا خُلُقُ اللِّئَامِ وَإِنَّ الْمُسِي‏ءَ لَمُتَرَدٍّ فِي جَهَنَّمَ بِإِسَاءَتِهِ
enWisdom: Beware of doing wrong [to others], for indeed it is a vile quality and verily the one who hurts others will surely be thrown into hell because of his wrongs

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ إِنْ أَسَأْتَ فَنَفْسَكَ تَمْتَهِنُ [تَمْهَنُ‏] وَإِيَّاهَا تَغْبِنُ
enWisdom: Verily if you do wrong [to others] then you are only debasing and harming yourself

Wisdom: مَنْ جَرَى فِي مَيْدَانِ إِسَاءَتِهِ كَبَا فِي جَرْيِهِ
enWisdom: One who proceeds in the course of his offences stumbles in his progress
